string.name: privacy_message
string.Data: "We need to collect necessary personal information to improve ShareMe and your user experience. To learn more, see our Privacy Policy. You can change your privacy settings any time in the \"About\" section of ShareMe's settings. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using our services."

string.name: privacy_new_message
string.Data: Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before you continue.

resources.string: "We've updated ShareMe's terms and conditions. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before you continue. You can change these settings anytime in the \"About\" section of this app."
Allow ShareMe to modify system settings.
Turn on Bluetooth to find devices nearby
Turn off Airplane mode to find devices nearby
"Other devices can't find you when Bluetooth is off."
"You won't be able to find some devices when Bluetooth is off."

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of ShareMe. We will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As ShareMe provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept these services."

By toggling off the switch, you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of ShareMe. We will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period as required by applicable laws. ShareMe needs to collect necessary personal information to provide you with basic services. Your withdrawal of consent to its Privacy Policy will be held as refusing to accept its services based on collected personal information.
Join our User Experience program to share user data with us in order to help us improve our products and services.

string.name: welcome_private_policy
string.Data: Welcome to ShareMe! This app allows you to transfer files via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi without connecting to the internet. ShareMe needs to collect necessary personal information to improve user experience and product quality. You can learn how we handle the information we collect in our Privacy Policy. You can always withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of ShareMe in \"About\". Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using ShareMe.

resources.string: Save WhatsApp statuses without using mobile data
Looks like Wi-Fi assistant is on. Turn this feature off to prevent the connection from being interrupted.
Turn on Wi-Fi to search for devices nearby.
"ShareMe is a system app. You won't be able to transfer files to other devices without using the internet after you uninstall the app."
"ShareMe is a system app. You won't be able to transfer files to other devices without using the internet after you remove the Home screen shortcut."
Sorry, the Android camera encountered a problem. You may need to restart the device.
Place a barcode inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
